artifact_ssr_001.name: Colossus Arm
artifact_ssr_001.description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.
artifact_ssr_001.source: Summon a colossus arm to fight for you for the next 20 seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>300</> seconds. Gain hitstun immunity for the next 20 seconds. Tap the Relic again to cancel. Normal attacks deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> enemies. Skills deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

advancement.description: Fire **2** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Reduce cooldown to **200** seconds.
Fire **4** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Colossus Arm lasts for **30** seconds. All damage taken for this duration is reduced by **20%**.

artifact_ssr_002.name: Omnium Shield
artifact_ssr_002.description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.
artifact_ssr_002.source: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with starting energy equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and a <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown.

advancement.description: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by **50%** for **2** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **60** seconds.
Extend duration to **20** seconds.
Reduce frost damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When Wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by **25%** for **7** seconds.

artifact_ssr_004.name: Type V Armor
artifact_ssr_004.description: Worried about losing battles and tucking your tail? Do your feet constantly weigh you down? Then, try this transformation on for size. Anytime, anywhere, deploy and pilot the Type V-II Droid. For an entire minute, experience what it's like to chase the wind in this new era of technology!
artifact_ssr_004.source:
Pilot mechanized armor to fight for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Immune to hitstun. Tap again to exit and detonate the armor. Skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>.
<yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>: Shoot rapidly to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>44.4%</> of ATK per hit.

advancement.description: When piloting the armor, gain immunity to flame damage and control effects.

Gain the **Artillery Fire** skill.
**Artillery Fire**: Fire **6** times at the locked-on target. Each hit deals damage equal to **155.2%** of ATK.
When piloting the armor, dealing damage also inflicts burn.
Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

Gain the **Flame Domain** skill.
**Flame Domain**: Erect a wide-range Flame Domain at the current location, dealing damage equal to a maximum of **1,146.8%** of ATK.

artifact_ssr_005.name: Spacetime Rift
artifact_ssr_005.description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.
artifact_ssr_005.source: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets caught in the area every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>100</> seconds.

advancement.description: Enemies caught within the rift who are close to the ground are unable to dodge, and the vacuum duration is increased to **15** seconds.
Increase the target area by **100%**.
Increase damage dealt to targets in the area by **20%**.
Reduce flame damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Enemies within the rift are unable to receive any healing.
Stun targets for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **180** seconds.
Increase damage dealt by energy pulses by **30%**.
Reduce cooldown to **120** seconds.
Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Trigger a seismic wave every **3** seconds, **suspending targets**. The waves can be dodged by jumping.

artifact_ssr_008.name: Drone
artifact_ssr_008.description: Are you fighting alone? Summon support drones to help you battle, so you can fight with confidence.
artifact_ssr_008.source: Summon a Drone for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, increasing final damage reduction by <shuzhi>5%</> every <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>120</> seconds.

advancement.description: Remove all control effects and grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
Extend duration to **25** seconds.
Every **5** seconds, additionally grant Wanderers one stack of inspiration, increasing damage dealt by **5%** per stack.
Reduce volt damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
The Wanderer's attacks convert **20%** of damage dealt into HP for the duration of the drone.

artifact_ssr_010.name: Hologram Projector
artifact_ssr_010.description: Project a hologram that synchronously replays the Wanderer's attacks.
artifact_ssr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK.

advancement.description: Extend duration to **20** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **120** seconds.
Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

artifact_ssr_011.name: Alternate Destiny
artifact_ssr_011.description: A mysterious organization is said to have invented this device to prevent the death of the user. Some claim the device came from the tale of golden fruit and a satyr archer, while others believe it was created specifically to deal with the explosion of Omnium Towers.
artifact_ssr_011.source: Generate a Pocket Dimension for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Allied Wanderers gain immunity to hitstun effects in the dimension, and HP will not drop below <shuzhi>20%</> from enemy attacks. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. Leaving the dimension removes all buffs. Once you have spent <shuzhi>8</> seconds in the dimension, you cannot be buffed by it for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

advancement.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension recovers **15%** HP **8** seconds later.
Allied units in the dimension gain **25%** lifesteal.
Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain immunity to all control effects.
Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Until the Relic disappears, allied Wanderers in the dimension double all lifesteal effects when HP drops to **40%** or below.

artifact_ssr_012.name: Type II Couant
artifact_ssr_012.description: As a result of the new Relic developed by Couant, Executors no longer need to be put in dangerous situations.
artifact_ssr_012.source: Summon a Type II Couant and generate a shield for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, which disappears after 5 seconds or after being struck once. Upon disappearing, the shield knocks back nearby enemies and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of Attack +<shuzhi>50</>. After the shield is broken, increase damage by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. For every <shuzhi>1</> second the generated shield exists on the battlefield, gain 1 additional stack of blessing once the shield ends (is broken). Each blessing stack will reduce damage by <shuzhi>2%</> for <shuzhi> 10</> seconds. Stack up to <shuzhi>5</> times. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds (shares cooldown with other Couants).

advancement.description: Grant **100** energy immediately upon use if HP is greater than **90%**. If HP is less than **90%**, immediately grant **50** energy, then **50** more energy once the damage increase expires.
Increase the duration of damage boost to **12** seconds.
Every stack of blessing additionally increases final damage by **1%** for **12** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When there are a full 5 stacks of blessing, additionally increase final damage by **2.5%** and reduce damage received by **5%** for **12** seconds.

artifact_ssr_013.name: Hoverboard
artifact_ssr_013.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

advancement.description: Reduce cooldown to 60 seconds.
Endurance cost is halved on the ground, no cost in the water.
Ignore cooldown when swimming.
Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce cooldown to 30 seconds.

artifact_ssr_014.name: Heaven's Dice
artifact_ssr_014.source:
Roll all the dice, and different quantities of dice you cast have different effects. Every time you roll a dice in battle, you will randomly gain <shuzhi>1</> out of <shuzhi>10</> buffs which is cleared after the battle. The buffs include: Frost damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, flame damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, volt damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, physical damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, altered damage +<shuzhi>10%</>, frost damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, flame damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, volt damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, physical damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>, and altered damage received −<shuzhi>5%</>. Only <shuzhi>1</> random buff can be gained when casting dice, and all effects are only stacked <shuzhi>1 time</>. At 5 stars, rolling 3 Heaven's Dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. A new dice are gained every <shuzhi>30</> seconds, and up to <shuzhi>3</> dice can be accumulated. When<shuzhi>Couant</> or <shuzhi>Type II Couant</> is deployed, no dice rolling would be allowed: 
When <shuzhi>1</> dice is cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge. If the number rolled is <shuzhi>1</> or <shuzhi>6</>, get the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect: Gain <shuzhi>20%</> damage boost for <shuzhi>35</> seconds.
When <shuzhi>2</> dice are cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge and the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect. If the <shuzhi>2</> dice have the same number of points, get the <shuzhi>Fusion</> effect: Clear the cooldown of all weapon skills.
When <shuzhi>3</> dice are cast, immediately get <shuzhi>180</> weapon charge, the <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> effect, and the <shuzhi>Fusion</> effect. If the <shuzhi>3</> dice have the same number of points, get the <shuzhi>Overclock</> effect: Using discharge skills within <shuzhi>6</> seconds doesn't cost weapon charge.
When the Relic Heaven's Dice is removed, clear the random buffs and Thermonuclear effect added by the Heaven's Dice.

advancement.description: Reduce availability for each dice to **20** seconds.
**Thermonuclear** Damage Boost: Gain a **25%** damage boost for **45** seconds.
After each roll of dice, there is a **50%** chance of getting 1 die. Cooldown: **15 seconds**.
Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Rolling **3** dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. If their sum is **14** or more, gain the **Overclock** effect.
Reduce cooldown to **60** seconds.
Recover to full endurance when using the Mini Pelican, not effective when exhausted.
The Mini Pelican can store up to **3** charges.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduces cooldown to **30** seconds and unlocks the Mini Pelican paint: **Pigmentation**.

artifact_ssr_016.name: Overdrive Shot
artifact_ssr_016.source:
When used, mark the current weapon and grant it <shuzhi>3</> doses that last for <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Also gain the <shuzhi>Micro Attack</> effect: Increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Using a marked weapon's skill consumes <shuzhi>1</> dose each time and grants <shuzhi>Overdrive</>: Increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>15%</> for <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Overdrive is removed when switching to other weapons. Overdrive Shot has a <shuzhi>240</>-second cooldown.
When removing Overdrive Shot or switching Relics, the remaining doses, the Micro Attack, and Overdrive effects will all be removed. When a weapon is marked a second time, the doses from the first mark are removed.

advancement.description: Grant **5** doses each time.
Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to **20%** of Max HP instead in Apex League.
Reduce cooldown to **150** seconds.
Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
While **Micro Attack** is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by **4%**.
Grant **5** doses each time.
While **Micro Attack** is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by **20%**.
Reduce cooldown to **150** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **150** seconds.
Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to **20%** of Max HP instead in Apex League.

artifact_ssr_018.name: Thalassic Heart
artifact_ssr_018.description: Legend has it that a mythical siren heart hidden within a thorny conch shell is capable of calling a storm upon the waves. Honoring this myth, the Ocean Development Group chose to name one of their important instruments after the heart. Though it cannot command storms, it can control water flow to augment the tide. Its complete model is even capable of transforming into a dolphin.
artifact_ssr_018.source: Generate a Thalassic Heart at the target's location. Cooldown: <shuzhi>60</> seconds. Every <shuzhi>2</> seconds, the Thalassic Heart will deal damage to nearby targets equal to <shuzhi>2%</> (<shuzhi>0.2%</> in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP for <shuzhi>45</> seconds. The type of elemental damage dealt will be that of the current weapon. Damage received by targets hit is also increased by <shuzhi>4%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

advancement.description: Thalassic Heart will raise the tide **1** time every **15** seconds, dealing damage equal to **15%** (**1.5%** in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP to nearby targets.
Thalassic Heart duration is extended to **90** seconds.
Damage dealt to targets hit by Thalassic Heart is additionally increased by **5.5%**.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

While diving, use Thalassic Heart to transform into a dolphin for up to **45** seconds, during which enemies will not attack for **15** seconds, and movement speed will be increased.
While transformed, the next attack will thrash the seawater, dealing damage equal to **25%** (**2.5%** in Apex League) of your Max HP to nearby targets, and will end the transformation.

artifact_ssr_019.name: Speedwalkers
artifact_ssr_019.source: Speedwalkers can be used to enter the zephyr state, allowing you to move freely on the wall and jump to quickly cover a short distance for <shuzhi>15</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. Speedwalkers are only usable in Domain 9.

advancement.description: Zephyr duration is extended to **30** seconds.
In the zephyr state, speed on the ground and walls is increased by **15%** and jump height is increased.
Speedwalkers can store up to **2** charges.
Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
During zephyr, each hit from aerial attacks recovers dodge attempts and aerial dodges recover all endurance.

artifact_ssr_020.name: Bubble Gun
artifact_ssr_020.description: They said that a short blond creator in Mirroria made this on a whim...
artifact_ssr_020.source: Tap the fire button to consume <shuzhi>1</> drop of bubble solution and fire a few bubbles that deal damage equal to <shuzhi>10%</> of ATK each. Hold for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds to consume <shuzhi>5</> drops of bubble solution and fire a big bubble that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>300%</> of ATK. The big bubble is capable of engulfing most small targets and causing them to fly away. Each target can only be engulfed and flown <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds, and targets with hyperbody are not affected. Big bubbles have a <shuzhi>5</>-second cooldown. The bubble solution is refilled at a rate of <shuzhi>1</> drop every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, and <shuzhi>10</> drops are refilled after defeating an enemy. Bubble Gun can hold up to <shuzhi>30</> drops of bubble solution.

advancement.description: Increase the number of small bubbles fired. The wielder also moves backward when firing small bubbles. After firing the relic, increase speed by **10%** for **30** seconds.

Gain **1** / **3** stacks of Happy Time after firing small and large bubbles, respectively. Each stack increases the Wanderer's damage dealt by **1.8%** for **60** seconds, stacking up to **5** times.
Use the Bubble Gun to summon a Bubble Spirit that fires bubbles and refreshes the duration of Happy Time. The Spirit lasts **150** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase the Happy Time damage boost by an additional **0.6%** per stack.

artifact_ssr_021.name: Triple Mask
artifact_ssr_021.description: Originally developed to assist patients with facial injuries, it ended up accumulating a great deal of versatile functions beyond its ornamental value. While a mask is typically used to hide the wearer, the technology within one can also unveil new aspects of the world.
artifact_ssr_021.source: Use to put on Triple Mask's Mask of the Void. While exploring the Overworld, you will not be attacked by enemies other than bosses. When discovered by certain enemies, detection will be triggered. While wearing Mask of the Void, enemies under the influence of the mask will not alert other enemies when attacked. Use Triple Mask again to remove the current mask and enter cooldown. Cooldown: <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

advancement.description: Unlocks Mask of the Hunter. Select when using Triple Mask and confirm again to wear. While Mask of the Hunter is worn, you can view the locations of elite achievement enemies in Domain 9 on the map.
While Triple Mask is deployed, speed is increased by **8%** and elemental damage is increased by **8%**.
Unlocks Mask of the Knowledge. While Mask of the Knowledge is worn, when there is an unopened chest nearby, you will be prompted and guided to the location of the chest.
Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
While Triple Mask is deployed, elemental damage is additionally increased by **8%**.

artifact_sr_001.name: Hovering Cannon
artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.
artifact_sr_001.source: Summon a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</> seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals <shuzhi>5.6%</> ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>240</> seconds.

advancement.description: Hovering Cannon lasts for **24** seconds.
Gain the **Laser Matrix** skill: Freeze targets after dealing damage to them **4** times in a row and deal damage equal to a maximum of **93.2%** of ATK.
Reduce cooldown to **150** seconds.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Gain the **Crash** skill: Deal damage to the target equal to **55.9%** of ATK and stun them for **0.5** seconds.

artifact_sr_004.name: Jetpack
artifact_sr_004.description: A great device to have for roaming around.

advancement.description: Replenish 1 charge every **100** seconds. Gliding no longer expends endurance.
Gliding for longer than 3 seconds empowers the next pummel attack to stun the target for 2 seconds.
Replenish **1** charge every 60 seconds.
Reduce physical damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Store up to **3** charges.

artifact_sr_005.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
artifact_sr_005.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

advancement.description: **Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.
Increase blast radius by **50%**.
Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
**Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.

artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.name: Lava Bomb
artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
artifact_sr_005_B_WXM.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

advancement.description: **Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.
Increase blast radius by **50%**.
Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
**Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.
**Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.
Increase blast radius by **50%**.
Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
**Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.

artifact_sr_006.name: Jetboard
artifact_sr_006.description: Roam the endless wilderness with this under your feet.

advancement.description: Gain **10** weapon charge points every second while gliding.
Reduce charge time to **60** seconds.
Jetboard collision damage is increased by **100%**, and charge time is reduced to **45** seconds.
Reduce frost damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Immune to control effects while using the Jetboard. Using the Jetboard to attack and hit targets **stuns** them for **5** seconds. Charge time is reduced to **30** seconds.

artifact_sr_007.name: Magnetic Storm
artifact_sr_007.description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

advancement.description: Unleash **2** electric tornadoes.
Increase tornado damage by **20%**.
Unleash **3** electric tornadoes.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

artifact_sr_009.name: Quantum Cloak
artifact_sr_009.description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.
artifact_sr_009.source: Enter a quantum state for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, during which enemies cannot detect the wearer. The wearer exits quantum state after attacking once. Cooldown: <shuzhi>120</> seconds.

advancement.description: Quantum state lasts for **20** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **80** seconds.
+**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **1** successful attack.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
+**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **3** successful attacks.

artifact_sr_010.name: Missile Barrage
artifact_sr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
artifact_sr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK.

advancement.description: Number of missiles launched increases every second.
Increase Missile Barrage damage by **20%**.
Missile Barrage lasts for **12** seconds.
Increase physical damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.

artifact_sr_011.name: Cybernetic Arm
artifact_sr_011.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.
artifact_sr_011.source: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal <shuzhi>100%</> damage on hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and regenerate weapon charge by <shuzhi>300</>. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to <shuzhi>2</> charges at a time. Regain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancement.description: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by **20%** for **7** seconds.
Regain **1** charge every **15** seconds.
Store up to **3** charges.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce final damage of targets hit by **30%** for **7** seconds.

artifact_sr_012.name: Couant
artifact_sr_012.description: You dare strike me? You'll get what's coming to you!
artifact_sr_012.source: Summon a droid and generate a shield for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. The shield disappears after <shuzhi>5</> seconds or after being struck once. When it disappears, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>50</>. If broken within <shuzhi>1</> second of being created, the shield will stun enemies for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Share cooldown with Type II Couant.

advancement.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by **20%** for **10** seconds.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.
Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6**× damage taken back at the attacker.

artifact_sr_013.name: Strange Cube
artifact_sr_013.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.
artifact_sr_013.source: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and cause <shuzhi>5</>-second <shuzhi>stun</>. Suspend blue Omnium items from Banges Tech for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. While suspended, the target recharges when taking attacks. When resumed, the target flies in the opposite direction of the attacks and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to any object crashed into. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancement.description: After activating the Strange Cube, increase damage dealt by **10%** for **10** seconds.
After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by **200**.
Increase Strange Cube's uses to **2**.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
After activating the Strange Cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every **1%** of HP lost, gain **10** weapon charge.

artifact_sr_014.name: Omnium Handcannon
artifact_sr_014.description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.
artifact_sr_014.source: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can hold up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

advancement.description: Increase duration of energy pillars to **30** seconds.
Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for **20** seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.
Stores up to **3** charges
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce charge time to **40** seconds.

artifact_sr_015.name: Magnetic Pulse
artifact_sr_015.description: Greetings. Please maintain appropriate social distance.
artifact_sr_015.source: Detonate a Magnetic Bomb, dealing volt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. Grant the user immunity to hitstun for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</> seconds.

advancement.description: Can be used while under control effects.
Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
Upon hitting the target, plant a **7**-second Magnetic Bomb that detonates if the target uses normal attacks/dodges/skills, causing **40%** Slow for **5** seconds, and disappears after detonation.
Reduce volt damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Detonating the Magnetic Bomb removes all current buffs from the target.

artifact_sr_017.name: Canned Spinach
artifact_sr_017.source: After eating a can of empowering vegetables, the Wanderer will be unable to act for <shuzhi>6</> seconds except to use Relics, but recover <shuzhi>2%</> of Max HP every second. When receiving damage during this time, restore the same value of HP as the damage received. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancement.description: Can be used while under control effects.
Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.

Reduce volt damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Detonating the Magnetic Bomb removes all current buffs from the target.

artifact_sr_018.name: Flashbang
artifact_sr_018.source: Throw a flashbang forwards, with an AoE affecting allies and enemies alike for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. You and allies can avoid its effects by facing away.

advancement.description: Can be used while under control effects.
Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
Upon hitting the target, plant a **7**-second Magnetic Bomb that detonates if the target uses normal attacks/dodges/skills, causing **40%** Slow for **5** seconds, and disappears after detonation.

wormhole_artifact_sr_001.name: Hovering Cannon
wormhole_artifact_sr_001.description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.
wormhole_artifact_sr_001.source: Summon a Hovering Cannon for <shuzhi>20</> seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals <shuzhi>5.6%</> ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: <shuzhi>240</> seconds.

advancement.description: Hovering Cannon lasts for **24** seconds.
Gain the **Laser Matrix** skill: Freeze targets after dealing damage to them **4** times in a row and deal damage equal to a maximum of **93.2%** of ATK.
Reduce cooldown to **150** seconds.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Gain the **Crash** skill: Deal damage to the target equal to **55.9%** of ATK and stun them for **0.5** seconds.

wormhole_artifact_sr_004.name: Jetpack
wormhole_artifact_sr_004.description: A great device to have for roaming around.

advancement.description: Replenish 1 charge every **100** seconds. Gliding no longer expends endurance.
Gliding for longer than 3 seconds empowers the next pummel attack to stun the target for 2 seconds.
Replenish **1** charge every 60 seconds.
Reduce physical damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Store up to **3** charges.

wormhole_artifact_sr_005.name: Lava Bomb
wormhole_artifact_sr_005.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
wormhole_artifact_sr_005.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

advancement.description: **Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.
Increase blast radius by **50%**.
Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
**Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.
**Stun** targets for **2** seconds on hit, and burn them.

Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

wormhole_artifact_sr_007.name: Magnetic Storm
wormhole_artifact_sr_007.description: Contain a powerful device that transmits the magnetic field nearby, producing an electric tornado that throws enemies into the air.

advancement.description: Unleash **2** electric tornadoes.
Increase tornado damage by **20%**.
Unleash **3** electric tornadoes.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

Increase tornado damage by **20%**.
Unleash **3** electric tornadoes.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Those caught in tornadoes have a **50%** chance to be disoriented for **3** seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

wormhole_artifact_sr_009.name: Quantum Cloak
wormhole_artifact_sr_009.description: With this, you no longer need your robe and wizard hat. Become the hero in your own magical world when you put on this cloak, which makes your body intangible, taking no damage.
wormhole_artifact_sr_009.source: Enter a quantum state for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, during which enemies cannot detect the wearer. The wearer exits quantum state after attacking once. Cooldown: <shuzhi>120</> seconds.

advancement.description: Quantum state lasts for **20** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **80** seconds.
+**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **1** successful attack.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
+**100%** damage in Quantum state, negated after **3** successful attacks.

wormhole_artifact_sr_010.name: Missile Barrage
wormhole_artifact_sr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
wormhole_artifact_sr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK.

advancement.description: Number of missiles launched increases every second.
Increase Missile Barrage damage by **20%**.
Missile Barrage lasts for **12** seconds.
Increase physical damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.

wormhole_artifact_sr_011.name: Cybernetic Arm
wormhole_artifact_sr_011.description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the target in.
wormhole_artifact_sr_011.source: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal <shuzhi>100%</> damage on hit, <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> the target, and regenerate weapon charge by <shuzhi>300</>. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to <shuzhi>2</> charges at a time. Regain <shuzhi>1</> charge every <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancement.description: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by **20%** for **7** seconds.
Regain **1** charge every **15** seconds.
Store up to **3** charges.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce final damage of targets hit by **30%** for **7** seconds.

wormhole_artifact_sr_012.name: Couant
wormhole_artifact_sr_012.description: You dare strike me? You'll get what's coming to you!
wormhole_artifact_sr_012.source: Summon a droid and generate a shield for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. The shield disappears after <shuzhi>5</> seconds or after being struck once. When it disappears, it knocks back nearby enemies, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>100%</> of ATK plus <shuzhi>50</>. If broken within <shuzhi>1</> second of being created, the shield will stun enemies for <shuzhi>2</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Share cooldown with Type II Couant.

advancement.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by an amount equal to the percentage of HP lost. This lasts for **10** seconds. Increase damage by a minimum of **30%**.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.
Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6**× damage taken back at the attacker.
When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by **35%** for **6** seconds.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by **20%** for **10** seconds.
After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by **30%** for **6** seconds.
Reduce flame damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When the shield breaks, gain a **5**-second damage reflection effect, reflecting **0.6**× damage taken back at the attacker.

wormhole_artifact_sr_013.name: Strange Cube
wormhole_artifact_sr_013.description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.
wormhole_artifact_sr_013.source: Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to nearby targets and cause <shuzhi>5</>-second <shuzhi>stun</>. Suspend blue Omnium items from Banges Tech for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. While suspended, the target recharges when taking attacks. When resumed, the target flies in the opposite direction of the attacks and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to any object crashed into. Cooldown: <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

advancement.description: After activating the Strange Cube, increase damage dealt by **10%** for **10** seconds.
After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by **200**.
Increase Strange Cube's uses to **2**.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
After activating the Strange Cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every **1%** of HP lost, gain **10** weapon charge.

wormhole_artifact_sr_014.name: Omnium Handcannon
wormhole_artifact_sr_014.description: The compressed cold jet is able to freeze the air.
wormhole_artifact_sr_014.source: Launch <shuzhi>1</> Omnium bomb at target location and create a scalable energy pillar upon striking the ground or water surface for up to <shuzhi>20</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>50</> seconds. Can hold up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

advancement.description: Increase duration of energy pillars to **30** seconds.
Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for **20** seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.
Stores up to **3** charges
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Reduce charge time to **40** seconds.

wormhole_artifact_sr_015.description: Greetings. Please maintain appropriate social distance.
wormhole_artifact_sr_015.source: Detonate a Magnetic Bomb, dealing volt damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> targets. Grant the user immunity to hitstun for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>35</> seconds.

advancement.description: Can be used while under control effects.
Grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
Upon hitting the target, plant a **7**-second Magnetic Bomb that detonates if the target uses normal attacks/dodges/skills, causing **40%** Slow for **5** seconds, and disappears after detonation.
Reduce volt damage received by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Detonating the Magnetic Bomb removes all current buffs from the target.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_001.name: Colossus Arm
wormhole_artifact_ssr_001.description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.
wormhole_artifact_ssr_001.source: Summon a colossus arm to fight for you for the next 20 seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>300</> seconds. Gain hitstun immunity for the next 20 seconds. Tap the Relic again to cancel. Normal attacks deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launch</> enemies. Skills deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{1}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> enemies. Cooldown: <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

advancement.description: Fire **2** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Reduce cooldown to **200** seconds.
Fire **4** missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Colossus Arm lasts for **30** seconds. All damage taken for this duration is reduced by **20%**.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_002.name: Omnium Shield
wormhole_artifact_ssr_002.description: Do you want to be the lead character of a movie? Do you want to stop any incoming bullets by simply raising your hand? Try out the Omnium Shield, which has a powerful barrier and stops incoming projectiles.
wormhole_artifact_ssr_002.source: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, with starting energy equal to <shuzhi>200%</> of the Wanderer's Max HP and a <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown.

advancement.description: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by **50%** for **2** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **60** seconds.
Extend duration to **20** seconds.
Reduce frost damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When Wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by **25%** for **7** seconds.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_004.name: Type V Armor
wormhole_artifact_ssr_004.description: Worried about losing battles and tucking your tail? Do your feet constantly weigh you down? Then, try this transformation on for size. Anytime, anywhere, deploy and pilot the Type V-II Droid. For an entire minute, experience what it's like to chase the wind in this new era of technology!
wormhole_artifact_ssr_004.source:
Pilot mechanized armor to fight for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>200</> seconds. Immune to hitstun. Tap again to exit and detonate the armor. Skill: <yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>.
<yellow_lbl_14_1>Aimed Shot</>: Shoot rapidly to deal damage equal to <shuzhi>44.4%</> of ATK per hit.

advancement.description: When piloting the armor, gain immunity to flame damage and control effects.

Gain the **Artillery Fire** skill.
**Artillery Fire**: Fire **6** times at the locked-on target. Each hit deals damage equal to **155.2%** of ATK.
When piloting the armor, dealing damage also inflicts burn.
Increase flame damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

Gain the **Flame Domain** skill.
**Flame Domain**: Erect a wide-range Flame Domain at the current location, dealing damage equal to a maximum of **1,146.8%** of ATK.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_005.name: Spacetime Rift
wormhole_artifact_ssr_005.description: Envious of others' ability to stop time? Trigger dimensional collapses with Spacetime Rift and become the master of time, drawing in nearby targets.
wormhole_artifact_ssr_005.source: Launch a proton bomb at the target location, creating a rift in time-space that draws in targets for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. After 1.5 seconds, the center of the rift deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK to targets caught in the area every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>100</> seconds.

advancement.description: Enemies caught within the rift who are close to the ground are unable to dodge, and the vacuum duration is increased to **15** seconds.
Increase the target area by **100%**.
Increase damage dealt to targets in the area by **20%**.
Reduce flame damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Enemies within the rift are unable to receive any healing.
Stun targets for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **180** seconds.
Increase damage dealt by energy pulses by **30%**.
Reduce cooldown to **120** seconds.
Increase physical damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Trigger a seismic wave every **3** seconds, **suspending targets**. The waves can be dodged by jumping.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_008.name: Drone
wormhole_artifact_ssr_008.description: Are you fighting alone? Summon support drones to help you battle, so you can fight with confidence.
wormhole_artifact_ssr_008.source: Summon a Drone for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, increasing final damage reduction by <shuzhi>5%</> every <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>120</> seconds.

advancement.description: Remove all control effects and grant immunity to control effects for the next **5** seconds.
Extend duration to **25** seconds.
Every **5** seconds, additionally grant Wanderers one stack of inspiration, increasing damage dealt by **5%** per stack.
Reduce volt damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
The Wanderer's attacks convert **20%** of damage dealt into HP for the duration of the drone.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_010.name: Hologram Projector
wormhole_artifact_ssr_010.description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
wormhole_artifact_ssr_010.source: Summon a missile launcher for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. <shuzhi>90</>-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>30%</> of ATK.

advancement.description: Extend duration to **20** seconds.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **75%** of the Wanderer's damage.
Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **100%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.
Extend duration to **20** seconds.
Reduce cooldown to **120** seconds.
Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
Increase volt damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Increase damage dealt by holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

wormhole_artifact_ssr_011.name: Alternate Destiny
wormhole_artifact_ssr_011.description: A mysterious organization is said to have invented this device to prevent the death of the user. Some claim the device came from the tale of golden fruit and a satyr archer, while others believe it was created specifically to deal with the explosion of Omnium Towers.
wormhole_artifact_ssr_011.source: Generate a Pocket Dimension for <shuzhi>8</> seconds. Allied Wanderers gain immunity to hitstun effects in the dimension, and HP will not drop below <shuzhi>20%</> from enemy attacks. Cooldown: <shuzhi>90</> seconds. Leaving the dimension removes all buffs. Once you have spent <shuzhi>8</> seconds in the dimension, you cannot be buffed by it for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

advancement.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension recovers **15%** HP **8** seconds later.
Allied units in the dimension gain **25%** lifesteal.
Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain immunity to all control effects.
Increase frost damage by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Until the Relic disappears, allied Wanderers in the dimension double all lifesteal effects when HP drops to **40%** or below.

artifact_sr_005_WXM.description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
artifact_sr_005_WXM.source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK and <shuzhi>strongly launching</> the target. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

Reduce cooldown to **30** seconds.

**Stun** targets for **3** seconds on hit and tire them for **10** seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.
